name: places/ChIJIZ_TsK1ZwokRDrZ_MUohtEc
formattedAddress: 520 8th Avenue, 16th floor, 500 8th Ave #520, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 520 8th Avenue, 16th floor, 500 8th Ave #520, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: I had the chance to be a part of their workshop during the pandemic. Having danced before, I was expecting an inclusive fun atmosphere. However the class didn’t care much about the form and postures. Moreover I am lefty so the I was trying to catch up with the super fast pace of this one day workshop. The instructor actually made me go to the last row to avoid covering me in the Instagram video she was so obsessed to make. I’m sorry I’m not paying a penny for being humiliated like that. I have learned bharatnatyam and I’ve danced in Shiamak’s academy so I wasn’t a  novice. Even if there were beginners they don’t deserve to be treated this way. Cheers :)

originalText.text: These classes are great! I have been going regularly for the past few months and the instructors are very friendly. It's an entertaining and energetic time with them :) Danced to a lot of popular bollywood numbers with fun choreos. Also really liked the innovative BollyStreet concept they had which was a different vibe altogether. You need zero skills or dance training to enter and can really improve as a dancer apart from just having fun

text.text: These classes are great! I have been going regularly for the past few months and the instructors are very friendly. originalText.text:
I have been taking classes here for the last few months, and I have had a a great time learning to dance to very cool songs, having a lot of fun, and making some great friends! They teach not just bollywood dance, but also a fusion of other styles such as contemporary and street.

Their recent new class of Bolly Street (bollywood + street dance) has been amazing, and is a very fresh take on dancing.

Their classes are a lot of fun, and a great workout. I highly recommend this place.

originalText.text: I am a bellydancer, i always like bollywood dance this is new Challenge for me i just started took one open level, i love the class.  I  bought 10 classes Package

text.text: I am a bellydancer, i always like bollywood dance this is new Challenge for me i just started took one open level, i love the class.  I  bought 10 classes Package

originalText.text: Bollywood funk classes are fun, fresh and empowering! Shoutout to Vaibhav for creating a space in Bollystreet that truly encourages pushing past one's comfort zones and losing yourself in dance. His dedication and passion to the craft is pretty amazing - but his ability to understand his students' needs and design choreos that truly accentuate his students' strengths is even more phenomenal. Dinesh's energy radiates in every class he instructs and his emphasis on the finer details/accents/style in his choreos can make anyone inevitably a better dancer. I've learned so much from that dynamic duo and I have a long way ahead. Forever grateful
